Mod.Name: AxlRose's WIP (Incomplete)
Mod.Author: AxlRose
Mod.Description:
Work in Progress mod, requires to be manually set at the top of your mod's list and includes:
- Few field upscaled backgrounds - Few field character textures - Other parts are coming soon

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: v2025.0116: - Field backgrounds: bghoke_3, bghoke_2, bgroad_6, bgroom_1, bg2f_2 and bg2f_1 (NEW) - Squall's d000 and d001 field model (low and high poly model)
